channel.title: Adding Customs
channel.description: Im using a TrisidiaX Source and I was wandering how to add customs because i have a itemdef file but i dont have a Model folder or any folders at that. Please help!!! :/

item.title: Adding Customs
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

It is usually a Raw folder in your cache.
Add this anywhere in your client class:

public void preloadModels() { File file = new File(signlink.findcachedir() + "Raw/"); File[] fileArray = file.listFiles(); for(int y = 0; y < fileArray.length; y++) { String s = fileArray[y].getName(); byte[] buffer = ReadFile(signlink.findcachedir() + "Raw/"+s); Model.method460(buffer,Integer.parseInt(getFileNameWithoutExtension(s))); } }
Then, in your startUp method, add this:

Under:

Read full topic
